description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Use after free in Bookmarks in Google Chrome prior to 123.0.6312.105 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

Use after free en Bookmarks de Google Chrome anterior a 123.0.6312.105 permitía a un atacante remoto explotar potencialmente la corrupción del montón a través de una página HTML manipulada. (Severidad de seguridad de Chrome: alta)
